channel.title: Anyone got this?
channel.description:
Hello, I have a MoparScape server, but i dont like my own server:| I want a nice gamemode with this things : - ::pickup command is only avaible for admins - There's a pk area - [u][b]No[/b][/u] ::melee or ::range sets - ::stuff with some noob stuff - Dragon is for 60 defence/attack etc. - Shops! (in Edgeville!) - Spawn in Edgeville - Combat NPC's
This request is based on the gamemode of [u]Fagex.no-ip.info[/u] Can anyone give a download link or make this for me plz?
thx

item.title: Anyone got this?
item.dc:creator: @MasterZer0 MasterZer0
item.description:
@MasterZer0 wrote:

A lot of this is basic stuff, can’t you just learn how to do it instead of requesting for it? If you learned about something like this you wouldn’t have to ask again.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got this?
item.dc:creator: @rotje333 rotje333
item.description:
@rotje333 wrote:

Hello,
I have a MoparScape server, but i dont like my own server:|
I want a nice gamemode with this things :

  • ::pickup command is only avaible for admins
  • There’s a pk area
  • No ::melee or ::range sets
  • ::stuff with some noob stuff
  • Dragon is for 60 defence/attack etc.
  • Shops! (in Edgeville!)
  • Spawn in Edgeville
  • Combat NPC’s

This request is based on the gamemode of Fagex.no-ip.info
Can anyone give a download link or make this for me plz?

thx
